meaningMnemonic: <radical>Ice</radical> from the <radical>east</radical> is <kanji>frozen</kanji>. Well, of course, all ice is frozen, but ice from the east is like, really super frozen.
readingMnemonic: Japan is a country in the east, and this ice was <kanji>frozen</kanji> in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. とうきょう is really good at freezing frozen things, so it makes sense that this frozen ice came from there.
